author: Danielle Allen
title: We need tech and government help with contact tracing. That doesn’t have to mean Big Brother. - The Washington Post
description: Let’s take the fight to the virus — without turning toward methods that trample civil liberties and disregard justice.
content:
We need toget to work on two phases.
First, restarting our economy will require millions of tests a day. In the current phase of social distancing, we need to test to get as many people as possible back to work. We should use testing both to diagnose the sym… [+5182 chars]
